content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Foot Smash The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn. Bludgeoning
Organ Scramble Triple damage. The target is fatigued. Piercing
Wing Tear The target loses any fly Speed until healed. Slashing
Energy Might If the bomb or spell deals acid, cold, electricity, fire or sonic damage, it deals triple damage. Any other bomb or spells deals double damage. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #51
